name: 瓦伦蒂娜·奥梅姆
awards: 2024年 第77届戛纳电影节 影评人周单元  短片发现奖 (提名) 女孩与陶罐
name_full: 瓦伦蒂娜·奥梅姆 Valentina Homem
introduction: Born in Recife (Brazil) in 1980Valentina is a Brazilian artist and filmmaker, active since the early 2000's. Her work has been screened in festivals such as Quinzaine des Cinéastes (2016), Ann Arbor Film Festival (2019), Festival dei Popoli, Vila do Conde, Cartagena Film Festival, Kinoforum. Her current film projects have been selected to script labs and international markets such as Cinemundi, Doc Montevideo, Doc SP, Miradas Doc. She is currently finishing her first feature narrative Um Dia Antes de Todos os Outros.
